title: aDesigner
creator: Eclipse Accessibility Tools Framework (ACTF) Project
description: aDesigner is a disability simulator that helps designers ensure that their content and applications are accessible and usable by the visually impaired. aDesigner also helps users to check accessibility of ODF documents. It also has accessibility information (MSAA/IA2) inspection functions.
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
Section 508, <abbr title="United States">US</abbr> federal procurement standard
<abbr title="Japanese Industry Standard">JIS</abbr>, Japanese industry standard
assists: Modifying the presentation of web pages
